text: Nanimono mo, hitobito no shinko o samatageru mono wanai. Sudeni kare-ra (makka no fushinjin-sha-tachi) ni onmichibiki ga kudattakara, omo ni yurushi o koeba yoi. Samonakereba mukashi no mono no (kabutta yona) koto ga kare-ra o osou ka, matawa chobatsu ga, madjikaku kare-ra ni kudaru soto arumai
